body:
#20657 added updates to support `clingo-cffi`. The new Github Action job though is using the original concretizer, since the
environment variable `SPACK_TEST_SOLVER` is not set to `clingo`. This can be verified by the log of successful tests:
![Screenshot from 2021-02-24 16-30-31](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4199709/109024077-a8556f80-76bd-11eb-8d03-fa3a955dc40b.png)

which reports XFAILs that are expected on the original concretizer.
title: clingo-cffi unit tests are running on the original concretizer
